hero.headline: Turn Your Goals Into Reality
hero.subheadline: Tell DOER your goal, and watch it transform into a structured plan complete with milestones, tasks, and a personalized timeline.
hero.placeholder: e.g., Learn to play guitar, Start a blog, Get in shape...
hero.inputSuggestions: Not sure where to start? Try one of these:
hero.suggestion1: Learn how to cook Tikka Masala
hero.suggestion2: Create a study plan for my AP Physics exam this Friday
hero.suggestion4: Start a blog and publish weekly articles

tabs.step1Title: Describe your goal or specific challenge.
tabs.step1Description: Tell DOER what you want to achieve, and we'll transform it into a structured plan with milestones, tasks, and a personalized timeline.
tabs.step2Title: Preview and refine your AI-generated plan.
tabs.step2Description: Review your personalized roadmap, adjust milestones, and customize your plan to match your preferences.
tabs.step3Title: Launch your customized plan and track your progress.
tabs.step3Description: Activate your plan, monitor progress in real-time, and work together with others to accomplish your goals.

features.title: Getting started with DOER
features.description: Transform your goals into actionable plans with AI-powered planning, milestone tracking, and seamless integrations.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect DOER with your favorite tools and services to streamline your planning and goal achievement.
integrations.subtitle: Each connector keeps the AI scheduler aware of your calendars, tasks, and energy so every update is reflected instantly.

cards.appleCalendar: Bi-directional sync lets DOER see every Apple Calendar commitment so the AI scheduler avoids double-booking the time it just planned.
cards.outlook: Outlook appointments feed into DOER, giving the scheduler context for blocking focus time and pushing calendar changes back into your inbox.
cards.googleCalendar: Google Calendar mirrors DOER’s AI-planned events, ensuring your availability stays truthful to external collaborators and public links.
cards.todoist: DOER publishes tasks to Todoist, updates their due dates, and marks them complete when the AI scheduler determines you’ve finished a milestone.
cards.asana: Map DOER milestones into Asana, so the AI scheduler keeps your project timelines aligned with the teams you already coordinate there.
cards.trello: Every DOER task becomes a Trello card with a due date, letting the scheduler claim the correct time while your board shows real progress.
cards.notion: Store plan context in Notion pages and DOER will reference those notes when updating the AI schedule or surfacing next actions.
cards.evernote: Evernote reminders convert into schedule-aware tasks, so DOER considers those follow-ups when reshuffling priorities.
cards.slack: Receive plan summaries in Slack, trigger reschedules with slash commands, and let the AI scheduler notify channels once the plan shifts.
cards.microsoftTeams: Teams calendars and meeting notes feed DOER so the scheduler can balance focus time with meetings while publishing updates to your team.
cards.strava: Strava workouts inform DOER about recovery windows, helping the AI scheduler avoid stacking high-intensity sessions on tired days.
cards.appleHealth: Apple Health metrics—sleep, heart rate, activity—give the AI scheduler data points to respect your energy when booking demanding tasks.
cards.coursera: DOER watches Coursera progress to block study sessions, timeline lessons, and mark completed modules inside the AI schedule.
cards.udemy: Udemy course progress becomes schedule-aware tasks, letting the AI scheduler reserve learning time without clashing with meetings.

testimonials.title: What people are saying
testimonials.description: Real feedback from users who are achieving their goals with DOER

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about DOER
faq.q1: How does DOER generate my plan?
faq.a1: DOER uses advanced AI to analyze your goal, break it down into actionable tasks, estimate timelines, and create a personalized roadmap. The AI considers complexity, dependencies, and realistic scheduling to give you an achievable plan.
faq.q2: Can I modify the AI-generated plan?
faq.a2: Absolutely! While DOER creates an intelligent starting point, you have full control to customize tasks, adjust timelines, reorder milestones, and adapt the plan to your specific needs and preferences.
faq.a3: DOER integrates with popular tools like Google Calendar, Outlook, Slack, Notion, Todoist, Asana, Trello, and more. Pro users get access to advanced integrations with HubSpot, Jira, and Google Workspace.
faq.q4: Is there a free plan available?
faq.a4: Yes! DOER offers a free plan with all core features including AI plan generation, task management, basic integrations, and daily automation. Perfect for personal use and getting started with goal achievement.
faq.q5: How does the smart scheduling work?
faq.a5: Our AI-powered scheduler analyzes your available time, task priorities, and dependencies to automatically place tasks in your calendar. It considers your work hours, existing commitments, and optimal productivity patterns.
faq.a6: Yes! Pro and Enterprise plans include team collaboration features like shared plans, role-based permissions, team dashboards, and coordinated scheduling to keep everyone aligned on complex initiatives.

cta.headline: So, what are we doing?
cta.subheadline: Are you a talker? Or are you a

footer.description: DOER is the AI-powered platform that transforms your goals into structured, actionable plans. Using natural language, DOER enables anyone to turn their ambitions into personalized roadmaps with milestones, tasks, and smart scheduling.

features.title: Features
features.description: Discover all the features that help you transform your goals into reality.
features.moreComingDescription: New capabilities ship every week so you can plan, execute, and adapt without friction. Join now to unlock the full DOER toolkit.

aiPlan.title: AI Plan Generator
aiPlan.description: Turn any goal or initiative into an actionable roadmap in seconds. DOER analyzes intent, breaks work into milestones, and estimates the effort required so teams can hit the ground running.
aiPlan.videoPrompt: Embed Loom walkthrough: typing a goal and reviewing the generated milestone plan.

smartScheduling.title: Smart Scheduling & Reshuffling
smartScheduling.description: Keep every task in the right place without babysitting the calendar. DOER proactively schedules, resolves conflicts, and reassigns work as priorities shift.
smartScheduling.videoPrompt: Embed Loom walkthrough: viewing the calendar, resolving a conflict, and auto-rescheduling.

automations.title: Automations & Integrations
automations.description: Connect DOER to the tools your team already relies on. Trigger automations from progress updates, and keep stakeholders aligned without manual follow-up.
automations.videoPrompt: Embed Loom walkthrough: configuring an automation and watching it fire in Slack.

analytics.title: Progress Analytics & Health
analytics.description: Understand the health of every plan at a glance. DOER surfaces trends, risks, and wins so leaders can respond before deadlines slip.
analytics.videoPrompt: Embed Loom walkthrough: navigating dashboards, spotting risks, and sharing a recap.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs.
pricing.creditTooltip: Credits cover Doer’s API endpoints—plan generation, auto-scheduling, AI retrospectives, and integrations. Each API call or integration action consumes one credit.

basic.name: Basic
basic.blurb: Organize your routines, capture tasks, and automate essentials with Doer’s core features at no cost.
highlights: Personal workspace and daily schedule automation
AI nudges and recap digest up to 3x each day
Recurring routines with calendar, email, and Discord sync
Two active automations plus checklist templates
Community knowledge base, accountability pods, and onboarding guides

pro.name: Pro
pro.blurb: Coordinate complex initiatives with AI scheduling, task automation, and integrations that keep every stakeholder aligned.
highlights: Increased limits on plan, goal, and task schedule automations
AI scheduling assistant for daily and weekly planning
Scenario planning with forecasted timelines and risk flags
Native integrations with Slack, HubSpot, Notion, Jira, and Google Workspace
Portfolio analytics, KPI dashboards, and proactive progress alerts
Role-based permissions, shared templates, and automation library
Executive briefings delivered via email, Slack, and mobile

custom.name: Custom
custom.blurb: White-glove support and bespoke automations for ambitious teams.
